tha-ap561:0.3_0: Held together by setting out water for washing.
tha-ap561:2.2_0: I flew to alms from alms.
tha-ap561:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap561:2.4_0: This is the fruit for you.
tha-ap561:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap561:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap561:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sivaka.
tha-ap561:7.1_0: the ninth senior mendicant with its ninety.
